name: Don't Stop the Party!
description:
You are the dancing queen and through the power of dancing you can keep the party going! Find out what the coolest dance moves are and combo them to get even more points during the limited time you have. Of course, you can always keep the party going by dancing away and showing everybody that the party doesn't stop. There are 6 different moves for you to discover, just be careful not to stumble into other people, that's a big no no in dance parties. 

RULES

Dance on the dance floor and find out the dance moves to earn points and more time for your party. Combine different dance moves to get combos. Don't bump into strangers, that will cause you to lose your accumulated points.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrows - Movement
